  name: "my_search_application",
  params: {
    elser: true,
    query_string: "where is the best mountain climbing?",
    elser_fields: [
      {
        name: "title",
        boost: 1,
      },
      {
        name: "description",
        boost: 1,
      },
    ],
  },
});
console.log(response);
